Package io.goobi.viewer.model.search

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IFacetItem  
    SearchInterface
    Interface that all classes must implement that may be used in jsf search masks SearchBean is the default implementation
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdvancedSearchFieldConfiguration
    Configuration element for advanced search fields.
    BrowseElement
    Representation of a search hit.
    CollectionResult
    Contains additional information of collections searched by SearchHelper.findAllCollectionsFromField(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, boolean, boolean, java.lang.String)
    FacetItem
    FacetItem class.
    FacetItem.AlphabeticComparator  
    FacetItem.CountComparator  
    FacetItem.NumericComparator  
    FacetItemAlphanumComparator
    Custom string comparator for browsing terms (case-insensitive, ignores brackets, natural sorting).
    FuzzySearchTerm
    Class for extracting the actual search term from a fuzzy search.
    GeoCoordinateFeature  
    GeoFacetItem  
    RelatedDocumentSearch
    Sample query : "{!join from=MD_IDENTIFIER to=MD_PROCESSID} +LABEL:MD_RELATIONSHIP_EVENT +PI_TOPSTRUCT:848f183d-ea46-48d7-a8f1-b9fab4da5c02"
    Search
    Persistable search query.
    SearchChildHit
    Class to represent children of SearchHit which don't represent a complete record and thus need less data.
    SearchFacets
    Current faceting settings for a search.
    SearchFilter
    SearchFilter class.
    SearchHelper
    Search utility class.
    SearchHit
    Wrapper class for search hits.
    SearchHitFactory  
    SearchHitsNotifier
    SearchHitsNotificationResource class.
    SearchQueryGroup
    Search query group for the advanced search.
    SearchQueryItem
    Field/operator/value tuple for the advanced search.
    SearchResultGroup
    Used for creating separate groups of search results for a single query.
    SearchSortingOption  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HitListView  
    HitType  
    SearchAggregationType

    SearchQueryItem.SearchItemOperator
